theBride.title: The Bride
theBride.content1: The story about how Joao and I met is so different and unique. It makes me believe in destiny and God's power. Both of us bring to this union a diversity of cultures, languages and ethnicities. However, it is our common values, the highest level of respect for one another and unconditional love that bonds us so strongly.  From the first day I met Joao, I knew he was my soulmate. I am blessed to connect my life with such an amazing, kind and loving person.
theBride.content2: I am so excited to celebrate our special day with our closest family and friends.

theGroom.title: The Groom
theGroom.content1: Mira is my partner, my soulmate, my better half, and most of all, my love. Without her, I would be lost in this world. I am looking forward to saying, "I do", starting a family and spending the rest of my life with this incredible woman.
theGroom.content2: I am so excited to share this very special day with all of you!

countdown.countingDown: We are counting down the days...

ceremony.title: The Ceremony
ceremony.name: The Church of Our Lady of the Incarnation
ceremony.description: We were blown away by the serenity and beauty of this church. Dating back to the 16th century, this baroque style church at the summit of the hill in the village of Porches, known as Igreja de Nossa Senhora da Encarnação, has beautiful azulejo tile installed throughout in its nave, complemented by a gilded carved wood altar. Dedicated to Mary, it has a special significance for Joao, who was born on the feast day of Our Lady.

reception.title: The Reception
reception.name: Vila Vita Parc
reception.location: Rua Anneliese Pohl, Alporchinhos, 8400-450 Porches, Portugal
reception.description: We knew that this was the one when we arrived. The sprawling manicured gardens, dotted with tropical flora and exquisite water features, stretch from the rear of the reception towards the Atlantic Ocean, eventually giving way to the coastal sandstone cliffs for which the Algarve region is famous, which, in turn, offers up a secluded private beach. We cannot wait to celebrate our union with you in this idyllic piece of paradise!

rsvp.title: Join Us
rsvp.rsvpReceived: We have received your RSVP. If your plans have changed, please let us know as soon as possible.
rsvp.forbidden: We can't seem to figure out who you are. Please click the link in your wedding invitation to RSVP.
rsvp.notfound: We can't seem to find your invitation. Please get in touch so that we can resolve this.
rsvp.error: Something seems to have gone wrong. Please reload the page and try again. If the problem persists, please get in touch so that we can resolve this.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.accommodationProvided: Accommodation is provided for you at Pestana Viking for 9-12 October 2019. If you would like to extend this, please enquire below.
accommodation.receptionDescription: We have secured preferential rates for our guests with Rita Pimentel at Vila Vita Parc. They are offering 10% off their normal rates.
accommodation.suggestedHotelsDescription: There are some other options close to the reception venue.

pestanaViking.title: Pestana Viking
pestanaViking.address: Praia Senhora da Rocha, Porches/Lagoa, 8400-450 Armação de Pêra, Portugal
pestanaViking.description: Pestana Viking is a 4-star hotel 5 minutes' drive from the reception.

vilaGaleNautico.title: Vila Gale Nautico
vilaGaleNautico.address: R. de Vale do Olival, 8365-158 Armação de Pêra, Portugal
vilaGaleNautico.description: Vila Gale Nautico is a 4-star hotel 5 minutes' drive from the reception.

accommodation.alternativeProvidersDescription: If the suggested accommodation is fully booked or unsuitable, you can make alternative arrangements. For your reference, we have provided the ceremony and reception locations below:

registry.title: Gift Registry
registry.content1: We are honoured you will share in our special day. Your presence is our gift!
registry.content2: We're lucky to already have a home full of everything we need, so please enjoy browsing this wish list, where you can contribute to our dream honeymoon in Cancún, Mexico!
registry.content3: Thanks for visiting and we can't wait to see you on our big day!
